docs.title: Let’s build with Kyronode
docs.text: Kyronode provides reliable validator and infrastructure services for blockchain networks. Secure. Scalable. Always online.

docs.title: 🌐 Mainnet Chains
docs.text: Kyronode makes it easier to test, validate, and explore. Discover the networks we support and start building today.

docs.title: Withdraw rewards and commission from your validator
Delegate to Yourself
docs.text: bitbadgeschaind tx staking delegate $(bitbadgeschaind keys show $WALLET --bech val -a) 1000000000ubadge --from $WALLET --chain-id bitbadges-1 --gas auto --gas-adjustment 1.3 --fees 0.025ubadge -y

docs.title: Delegate
docs.text: bitbadgeschaind tx staking delegate <TO_VALOPER_ADDRESS> 1000000000ubadge --from $WALLET --chain-id bitbadges-1 --gas auto --gas-adjustment 1.3 --gas auto --gas-adjustment 1.3 --fees 0.025ubadge -y

docs.title: Unbond
docs.text: bitbadgeschaind tx staking unbond $(bitbadgeschaind keys show $WALLET --bech val -a) 1000000000ubadge --from $WALLET --chain-id bitbadges-1 --gas auto --gas-adjustment 1.3 --fees 0.025ubadge -y

docs.title: Validator Details
docs.text: bitbadgeschaind q staking validator $(bitbadgeschaind keys show $WALLET --bech val -a)

docs.title: Active Validators List
docs.text: bitbadgeschaind q staking validators -oj --limit=2000 | jq '.validators[] | select(.status=="BOND_STATUS_BONDED")' | jq -r '(.tokens|tonumber/pow(10;6)|floor|tostring) + " " + .description.moniker' | sort -gr | nl

docs.title: Check Validator key
docs.text: [[ $(bitbadgeschaind q staking validator $VALOPER_ADDRESS -oj | jq -r .consensus_pubkey.key) = $(bitbadgeschaind status | jq -r .ValidatorInfo.PubKey.value) ]] && echo -e "Your key status is ok" || echo -e "Your key status is error"

docs.title: Edit Validator
docs.text:
bitbadgeschaind tx staking edit-validator \
--commission-rate 0.05 \
--new-moniker "$MONIKER" \
--identity "" \
--details "Kyronode for all" \
--from $WALLET \
--chain-id bitbadges-1 \
--fees 0.025ubadge \
-y

docs.title: Vote
docs.text: bitbadgeschaind tx gov vote 1 yes --from $WALLET --chain-id bitbadges-1 --gas auto --gas-adjustment 1.3 --fees 0.025ubadge -y

docs.title: 🚀 Bitbadges Installation Guide
docs.text: This guide helps you set up and run a Bitbadges Node. 🔗 Website | Discord | Twitter

docs.title: 📋 Recommended Specifications
docs.text: Component Minimum Recommended CPU 4 Cores 4+ Cores RAM 8 GB 8+ GB Storage 400 GB SSD 1 TB NVMe SSD OS Ubuntu 22.04 Ubuntu 22.04

docs.title: Install Go (if you don't have one)
docs.text:
cd $HOME
VER="1.24.4"
wget "https://golang.org/dl/go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/go
sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
rm "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"

[ ! -f ~/.bash_profile ] && touch ~/.bash_profile
echo "export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin:~/go/bin" >> ~/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile
[ ! -d ~/go/bin ] && mkdir -p ~/go/bin

docs.title: Set Environment Variables
docs.text:
# WARNING: Please replace <YOUR_WALLET>, <YOUR_MONIKER>, and <CUSTOM_PORT>
# with your own information before running the commands.
echo "export WALLET=<YOUR_WALLET>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export MONIKER=<YOUR_MONIKER>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export APP_PORT=<CUSTOM_PORT>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile

docs.title: Init & Config
docs.text:
bitbadgeschaind init $MONIKER --chain-id bitbadges-1
bitbadgeschaind config set client chain-id bitbadges-1
bitbadgeschaind config set client node tcp://localhost:${APP_PORT}657

docs.title: Custom Ports
docs.text:
# app.toml
sed -i.bak -e "s%:1317%:${APP_PORT}317%g;
s%:8080%:${APP_PORT}080%g;
s%:9090%:${APP_PORT}090%g;
s%:9091%:${APP_PORT}091%g;
s%:8545%:${APP_PORT}545%g;
s%:8546%:${APP_PORT}546%g;
s%:6065%:${APP_PORT}065%g" $HOME/.bitbadgeschain/config/app.toml

# config.toml
sed -i.bak -e "s%:26658%:${APP_PORT}658%g;
s%:26657%:${APP_PORT}657%g;
s%:6060%:${APP_PORT}060%g;
s%:26656%:${APP_PORT}656%g;
s%^external_address = \"\"%external_address = \"$(wget -qO- eth0.me):${APP_PORT}656\"%;
s%:26660%:${APP_PORT}660%g" $HOME/.bitbadgeschain/config/config.toml

docs.title: Create Service File
docs.text:
sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/bitbadgeschaind.service > /dev/null <<EOF
[Unit]
Description=bitbadgeschaind Node
After=network-online.target
[Service]
User=$USER
WorkingDirectory=$HOME/.bitbadgeschain
ExecStart=$(which bitbadgeschaind) start --home $HOME/.bitbadgeschain
Restart=on-failure
RestartSec=5
LimitNOFILE=65535
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

docs.title: Start Service
docs.text:
sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl enable bitbadgeschaind
sudo systemctl restart bitbadgeschaind && sudo journalctl -u bitbadgeschaind -fo cat

docs.title: Node Synchronize Checker
docs.text:
# Paste this to your terminal
bash <(curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kyronode/all-about-cosmos/refs/heads/main/Mainnet/Bitbadges/bitbadges-sync.sh)

docs.title: Create or Restore Wallet
docs.text:
Create new wallet and save ur mnemonics securely

bitbadgeschaind keys add $WALLET

If u want to restore use this command

bitbadgeschaind keys add $WALLET --recover

Set keys variable enviroment

WALLET_ADDRESS=$(bitbadgeschaind keys show $WALLET -a)
VALOPER_ADDRESS=$(bitbadgeschaind keys show $WALLET --bech val -a)
echo "export WALLET_ADDRESS="$WALLET_ADDRESS >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export VALOPER_ADDRESS="$VALOPER_ADDRESS >> $HOME/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile

docs.title: Create Validator
docs.text:
If ur node has been fully synchronized, then u can create ur validator: Please Change <YOUR_MONIKER><YOUR_IDENTITY><YOUR_WEBSITE><YOUR_DETAILS> with ur own.

cd $HOME
echo "{
  \"pubkey\": {\"@type\": \"/cosmos.crypto.ed25519.PubKey\", \"key\": \"$(bitbadgeschaind tendermint show-validator | grep -Po '\"key\":\s*\"\K[^\"]*')\"},
  \"amount\": \"1000000000ubadge\",
  \"moniker\": \"<YOUR_MONIKER>\",
  \"identity\": \"<YOUR_IDENTITY>\",
  \"website\": \"<YOUR_WEBSITE>\",
  \"security\": \"\",
  \"details\": \"<YOUR_DETAILS>\",
  \"commission-rate\": \"0.05\",
  \"commission-max-rate\": \"0.25\",
  \"commission-max-change-rate\": \"0.01\",
  \"min-self-delegation\": \"1\"
}" > validator.json

# Create a validator using the JSON configuration
bitbadgeschaind tx staking create-validator validator.json \
    --from wallet \
    --chain-id bitbadges-1 \
    --gas-prices 0.025ubadge \
    --gas-adjustment 1.3 \
    --gas auto \
    -y

docs.title: Delete Node
docs.text:
Please backup ur wallet and important file like "priv_validator_key.json" before deleting. 

sudo systemctl stop bitbadgeschaind
sudo systemctl disable bitbadgeschaind
sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo rm -rf /etc/systemd/system/bitbadgeschaind.service
sudo rm $(which bitbadgeschaind)
sudo rm -rf $HOME/.bitbadgeschain

docs.title: 💾 Snapshot
docs.text:
To quickly sync your node from the latest snapshot: 

COMING SOON

docs.title: Manual Upgrade
docs.text:
cd $HOME
sudo systemctl stop bitbadgeschaind
wget https://github.com/BitBadges/bitbadgeschain/releases/download/v13/bitbadgeschain-linux-amd64
chmod +x $HOME/bitbadgeschain-linux-amd64
sudo mv bitbadgeschain-linux-amd64 $(bitbadgeschaind)
bitbadgeschaind version
sudo systemctl start bitbadgeschaind && sudo journalctl -u bitbadgeschaind -fo cat

docs.title: 🚀 Paxi Installation Guide
docs.text: This guide helps you set up and run a Paxi Node. 🔗 Website | Discord | Twitter | Our Paxi Explorer

docs.title: 📋 Recommended Specifications
docs.text: Component Minimum Recommended CPU 4 Cores 4+ Cores RAM 8 GB 8+ GB Storage 400 GB SSD 1 TB NVMe SSD OS Ubuntu 22.04 Ubuntu 22.04

docs.title: Install Go (if you don't have one)
docs.text:
cd $HOME
VER="1.24.4"
wget "https://golang.org/dl/go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/go
sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
rm "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"

[ ! -f ~/.bash_profile ] && touch ~/.bash_profile
echo "export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin:~/go/bin" >> ~/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile
[ ! -d ~/go/bin ] && mkdir -p ~/go/bin

docs.title: Set Environment Variables
docs.text:
# WARNING: Please replace <YOUR_WALLET>, <YOUR_MONIKER>, and <CUSTOM_PORT> e.g 56,43,75
# with your own information before running the commands.
echo "export WALLET=<YOUR_WALLET>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export MONIKER=<YOUR_MONIKER>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export APP_PORT=<CUSTOM_PORT>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile

docs.title: Download Binary
docs.text:
cd $HOME
git clone https://github.com/paxi-web3/paxi.git
cd paxi
git checkout v1.0.5
make install
cp ~/paxid/paxid ~/go/bin

docs.title: Init & Config
docs.text:
paxid init $MONIKER --chain-id paxi-mainnet
paxid config set client chain-id paxi-mainnet
paxid config set client node tcp://localhost:${APP_PORT}657

docs.title: Custom Ports
docs.text:
# app.toml
sed -i.bak -e "s%:1317%:${APP_PORT}317%g;
s%:8080%:${APP_PORT}080%g;
s%:9090%:${APP_PORT}090%g;
s%:9091%:${APP_PORT}091%g;
s%:8545%:${APP_PORT}545%g;
s%:8546%:${APP_PORT}546%g;
s%:6065%:${APP_PORT}065%g" ~/go/bin/paxi/config/app.toml

# config.toml
sed -i.bak -e "s%:26658%:${APP_PORT}658%g;
s%:26657%:${APP_PORT}657%g;
s%:6060%:${APP_PORT}060%g;
s%:26656%:${APP_PORT}656%g;
s%^external_address = \"\"%external_address = \"$(wget -qO- eth0.me):${APP_PORT}656\"%;
s%:26660%:${APP_PORT}660%g" ~/go/bin/paxi/config/config.toml

docs.title: Create Service File
docs.text:
sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/paxid.service > /dev/null <<EOF
[Unit]
Description=paxi
After=network-online.target
[Service]
User=$USER
ExecStart=$(which paxid) start
Restart=on-failure
RestartSec=3
LimitNOFILE=65535
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

docs.title: Start Service
docs.text:
sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl enable paxid
sudo systemctl start paxid && sudo journalctl -u paxid -fo cat

docs.title: Snapshot
docs.text:
sudo apt install lz4 -y
sudo systemctl stop paxid
cp ~/go/bin/paxi/data/priv_validator_state.json ~/go/bin/paxi/priv_validator_state.json.backup
paxid tendermint unsafe-reset-all --home ~/go/bin/paxi --keep-addr-book
curl -L https://snapshot-t.vinjan.xyz/paxi/latest.tar.lz4  | lz4 -dc - | tar -xf - -C ~/go/bin/paxi
mv ~/go/bin/paxi/priv_validator_state.json.backup ~/go/bin/paxi/data/priv_validator_state.json
sudo systemctl restart paxid && sudo journalctl -u paxid -fo cat

docs.title: Node Synchronize Checker
docs.text:
#!/bin/bash
rpc_port=$(grep -m 1 -oP '^laddr = "\K[^"]+' "$HOME/go/bin/paxi/config/config.toml" | cut -d ':' -f 3)
while true; do
  local_height=$(curl -s localhost:$rpc_port/status | jq -r '.result.sync_info.latest_block_height')
  network_height=$(curl -s https://mainnet-rpc.paxinet.io/status | jq -r '.result.sync_info.latest_block_height')
  if ! [[ "$local_height" =~ ^[0-9]+$ ]] || ! [[ "$network_height" =~ ^[0-9]+$ ]]; then
    echo -e "\033[1;31mError: Invalid block height data. Retrying...\033[0m"
    sleep 5
    continue
  fi
  blocks_left=$((network_height - local_height))
  echo -e "\033[1;33mNode Height:\033[1;34m $local_height\033[0m \
\033[1;33m| Network Height:\033[1;36m $network_height\033[0m \
\033[1;33m| Blocks Left:\033[1;31m $blocks_left\033[0m"
  sleep 5
done

docs.title: Create or Restore Wallet
docs.text:
Create new wallet and save ur mnemonics securely

paxid keys add $WALLET

If u want to restore use this command

paxid keys add $WALLET --recover

Set keys variable enviroment

WALLET_ADDRESS=$(paxid keys show $WALLET -a)
VALOPER_ADDRESS=$(paxid keys show $WALLET --bech val -a)
echo "export WALLET_ADDRESS="$WALLET_ADDRESS >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export VALOPER_ADDRESS="$VALOPER_ADDRESS >> $HOME/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile

docs.title: Create Validator
docs.text:
If ur node has been fully synchronized, then u can create ur validator: Please Change <YOUR_MONIKER><YOUR_IDENTITY><YOUR_WEBSITE><YOUR_DETAILS> with ur own.

cd $HOME
echo "{
  \"pubkey\": {\"@type\":\"/cosmos.crypto.ed25519.PubKey\",\"key\": \"$(paxid tendermint show-validator | grep -Po '\"key\":\s*\"\K[^\"]*')\"},
  \"amount\": \"1000000upaxi\",
  \"moniker\": \"<YOUR_MONIKER>\",
  \"identity\": \"<YOUR_IDENTITY>\",
  \"website\": \"<YOUR_WEBSITE>\",
  \"security\": \"\",
  \"details\": \"<YOUR_DETAILS>\",
  \"commission-rate\": \"0.05\",
  \"commission-max-rate\": \"0.25\",
  \"commission-max-change-rate\": \"0.1\",
  \"min-self-delegation\": \"1\"
}" > validator.json

# Create a validator using the JSON configuration
paxid tx staking create-validator validator.json \
    --from $WALLET \
    --chain-id paxi-mainnet \
    --fees 15000upaxi \
    --gas-adjustment 1.3 \
    --gas auto \
    -y

docs.title: Delete Node
docs.text:
Please backup ur wallet and important file like "priv_validator_key.json" before deleting. 

sudo systemctl stop paxid
sudo systemctl disable paxid
sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo rm -rf /etc/systemd/system/paxid.service
sudo rm $(which paxid)
sudo rm -rf ~/go/bin/paxi/

Thanks to: Vinjan.Inc

docs.title: 🚀 Zenrock Installation Guide
docs.text: This guide helps you set up and run a Zenrock Node. 🔗 Website | Discord | Twitter

docs.title: 📋 Recommended Specifications
docs.text: Component Recommended CPU 4 Cores RAM 8 GB Storage 200 GB NVMe SSD OS Ubuntu 22.04

docs.title: Install Go (if you don't have one)
docs.text:
cd $HOME
VER="1.23.1"
wget "https://golang.org/dl/go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/go
sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
rm "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"

[ ! -f ~/.bash_profile ] && touch ~/.bash_profile
echo "export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin:~/go/bin" >> ~/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile
[ ! -d ~/go/bin ] && mkdir -p ~/go/bin

docs.title: Set Environment Variables
docs.text:

# with your own information before running the commands.
echo "export WALLET=<YOUR_WALLET>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export MONIKER=<YOUR_MONIKER>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export APP_PORT=<CUSTOM_PORT>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile

docs.title: Download Binary
docs.text:
cd $HOME
wget -O zenrockd.zip https://github.com/Zenrock-Foundation/zrchain/releases/download/v6.25.0/zenrockd.zip
unzip zenrockd.zip
rm zenrockd.zip
chmod +x $HOME/zenrockd
sudo mv $HOME/zenrockd $HOME/go/bin/

docs.title: Init & Config
docs.text:
zenrockd init $MONIKER --chain-id diamond-1
zenrockd config set client chain-id diamond-1
zenrockd config set client node tcp://localhost:${APP_PORT}657

[Install]

sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo rm -rf /etc/systemd/system/zenrockd.service
sudo rm $(which zenrockd)
sudo rm -rf $HOME/.zrchain

docs.title: 🌱 Seeds
docs.text:
We provide only active peers from our scanner:

e6c3373d68c504bd89bf77c27a8ac30597afeb2d@zenrock-mainnet-seed.itrocket.net:56656

docs.title: 💾 Snapshot
docs.text:
To quickly sync your node from the latest snapshot: 

COMING SOON

docs.title: Manual Upgrade
docs.text:
cd $HOME
wget -O zenrockd.zip https://github.com/Zenrock-Foundation/zrchain/releases/download/v6.25.0/zenrockd.zip
unzip zenrockd.zip
rm zenrockd.zip
chmod +x $HOME/zenrockd
sudo mv $HOME/zenrockd $(which zenrockd)
sudo systemctl restart zenrockd && sudo journalctl -u zenrockd -f

docs.title: 🧪 Testnet Chains
docs.text: Kyronode makes it easier to test, validate, and explore. Discover the networks we support and start building today.

docs.title: Withdraw rewards and commission from your validator
Delegate to Yourself
docs.text: emped tx staking delegate $(emped keys show $WALLET --bech val -a) 1000000uempe --from $WALLET --chain-id empe-testnet-2 --gas auto --gas-adjustment 1.5 --fees 30uempe -y

docs.title: Unbond
docs.text: emped tx staking unbond $(emped keys show $WALLET --bech val -a) 1000000uempe --from $WALLET --chain-id empe-testnet-2 --gas auto --gas-adjustment 1.5 --fees 30uempe -y

docs.title: Validator Details
docs.text: emped q staking validator $(emped keys show $WALLET --bech val -a)

docs.title: Active Validators List
docs.text: emped q staking validators -oj --limit=2000 | jq '.validators[] | select(.status=="BOND_STATUS_BONDED")' | jq -r '(.tokens|tonumber/pow(10;6)|floor|tostring) + " " + .description.moniker' | sort -gr | nl

docs.title: Check Validator key
docs.text: [[ $(emped q staking validator $VALOPER_ADDRESS -oj | jq -r .consensus_pubkey.key) = $(emped status | jq -r .ValidatorInfo.PubKey.value) ]] && echo -e "Your key status is ok" || echo -e "Your key status is error"

docs.title: Edit Validator
docs.text:
emped tx staking edit-validator \
--commission-rate 0.05 \
--new-moniker "$MONIKER" \
--identity "" \
--details "Kyronode for all" \
--from $WALLET \
--chain-id empe-testnet-2 \
--gas auto \
--gas-adjustment 1.5 \
--fees 30uempe \
-y

docs.title: Vote
docs.text: emped tx gov vote 1 yes --from $WALLET --chain-id empe-testnet-2 --gas auto --gas-adjustment 1.5 --fees 30uempe -y

docs.title: 🚀 Empeiria Installation Guide
docs.text: This guide helps you set up and run a Empeiria Node. 🔗 Website | Discord | Twitter

docs.title: 📋 Recommended Specifications
docs.text: Component Recommended CPU 4 Cores RAM 8 GB Storage 200 GB NVMe SSD OS Ubuntu 22.04

docs.title: Install Go (if you don't have one)
docs.text:
cd $HOME
VER="1.23.1"
wget "https://golang.org/dl/go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/go
sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
rm "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"

[ ! -f ~/.bash_profile ] && touch ~/.bash_profile
echo "export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin:~/go/bin" >> ~/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile
[ ! -d ~/go/bin ] && mkdir -p ~/go/bin

docs.title: Set Environment Variables
docs.text:
# WARNING: Please replace <YOUR_WALLET>, <YOUR_MONIKER>, and <CUSTOM_PORT>
# with your own information before running the commands.
echo "export WALLET=<YOUR_WALLET>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export MONIKER=<YOUR_MONIKER>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export APP_PORT=<CUSTOM_PORT>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile

docs.title: Download Binary
docs.text:
cd $HOME
rm -rf bin
mkdir bin
cd $HOME/bin
curl -LO https://github.com/empe-io/empe-chain-releases/raw/master/v0.4.0/emped_v0.4.0_linux_amd64.tar.gz
tar -xvf emped_v0.4.0_linux_amd64.tar.gz
chmod +x $HOME/bin/emped
mv $HOME/bin/emped ~/go/bin

docs.title: Init & Config
docs.text:
emped config node tcp://localhost:${APP_PORT}657
emped config keyring-backend os
emped config chain-id empe-testnet-2
emped init "test" --chain-id empe-testnet-2

docs.title: Custom Ports
docs.text:
# app.toml
sed -i.bak -e "s%:1317%:${APP_PORT}317%g;
s%:8080%:${APP_PORT}080%g;
s%:9090%:${APP_PORT}090%g;
s%:9091%:${APP_PORT}091%g;
s%:8545%:${APP_PORT}545%g;
s%:8546%:${APP_PORT}546%g;
s%:6065%:${APP_PORT}065%g" $HOME/.empe-chain/config/app.toml

# config.toml
sed -i.bak -e "s%:26658%:${APP_PORT}658%g;
s%:26657%:${APP_PORT}657%g;
s%:6060%:${APP_PORT}060%g;
s%:26656%:${APP_PORT}656%g;
s%^external_address = \"\"%external_address = \"$(wget -qO- eth0.me):${APP_PORT}656\"%;
s%:26660%:${APP_PORT}660%g" $HOME/.empe-chain/config/config.toml

docs.title: Create Service File
docs.text:
sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/emped.service > /dev/null <<EOF
[Unit]
Description=emped Node
After=network-online.target
[Service]
User=$USER
WorkingDirectory=$HOME/.empe-chain
ExecStart=$(which emped) start --home $HOME/.empe-chain
Restart=on-failure
RestartSec=5
LimitNOFILE=65535
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

docs.title: Start Service
docs.text:
sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl enable emped
sudo systemctl restart emped && sudo journalctl -u emped -fo cat

docs.title: Node Synchronize Checker
docs.text:
# Paste this to your terminal
bash <(curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kyronode/all-about-cosmos/refs/heads/main/Testnet/Empe/empe-sync.sh)

docs.title: Create or Restore Wallet
docs.text:
Create new wallet and save ur mnemonics securely

emped keys add $WALLET

If u want to restore use this command

emped keys add $WALLET --recover

Set keys variable enviroment

WALLET_ADDRESS=$(emped keys show $WALLET -a)
VALOPER_ADDRESS=$(emped keys show $WALLET --bech val -a)
echo "export WALLET_ADDRESS="$WALLET_ADDRESS >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export VALOPER_ADDRESS="$VALOPER_ADDRESS >> $HOME/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile

docs.title: Create Validator
docs.text:
If ur node has been fully synchronized, then u can create ur validator: Please Change <YOUR_MONIKER><YOUR_IDENTITY><YOUR_WEBSITE><YOUR_DETAILS> with ur own.

emped tx staking create-validator \
--amount 1000000uempe \
--from $WALLET \
--commission-rate 0.1 \
--commission-max-rate 0.2 \
--commission-max-change-rate 0.01 \
--min-self-delegation 1 \
--pubkey $(emped tendermint show-validator) \
--moniker "<YOUR_MONIKER>" \
--identity "<YOUR_IDENTITY>" \
--website "<YOUR_WEBSITE>" \
--details "<YOUR_DETAILS>" \
--chain-id empe-testnet-2 \
--gas auto --gas-adjustment 1.5 --fees 30uempe \
-y

docs.title: Delete Node
docs.text:
Please backup ur wallet and important file like "priv_validator_key.json" before deleting. 

sudo systemctl stop emped
sudo systemctl disable emped
sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo rm -rf /etc/systemd/system/emped.service
sudo rm $(which emped)
sudo rm -rf $HOME/.empe-chain

docs.title: 🚀 Node Installation Guide
docs.text: This guide helps you set up and run a Kiichain Node. 🔗 Website | Discord | Twitter

docs.title: 📋 Recommended Specifications
docs.text: Component Minimum Recommended CPU 4 Cores 4+ Cores RAM 8 GB 8+ GB Storage 1 TB NVMe SSD 2 TB NVMe SSD OS Ubuntu 22.04 Ubuntu 22.04

docs.title: Install Go (if you don't have one)
docs.text:
cd $HOME
VER="1.23.8"
wget "https://golang.org/dl/go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/go
sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
rm "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"

[ ! -f ~/.bash_profile ] && touch ~/.bash_profile
echo "export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin:~/go/bin" >> ~/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile
[ ! -d ~/go/bin ] && mkdir -p ~/go/bin

docs.title: Set Environment Variables
docs.text:
# WARNING: Please replace <YOUR_WALLET>, <YOUR_MONIKER>, and <CUSTOM_PORT>
# with your own information before running the commands.
echo "export WALLET=<YOUR_WALLET>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export MONIKER=<YOUR_MONIKER>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export APP_PORT=<CUSTOM_PORT>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile

docs.title: Download Binary
docs.text:
cd $HOME
rm -rf kiichain
git clone https://github.com/KiiChain/kiichain.git
cd kiichain
git checkout v4.0.0
make install

docs.title: Init & Config
docs.text:
kiichaind init $MONIKER --chain-id oro_1336-1
kiichaind config set client chain-id oro_1336-1
kiichaind config set client node tcp://localhost:${APP_PORT}657

docs.title: Custom Ports
docs.text:
# app.toml
sed -i.bak -e "s%:1317%:${APP_PORT}317%g;
s%:8080%:${APP_PORT}080%g;
s%:9090%:${APP_PORT}090%g;
s%:9091%:${APP_PORT}091%g;
s%:8545%:${APP_PORT}545%g;
s%:8546%:${APP_PORT}546%g;
s%:6065%:${APP_PORT}065%g" $HOME/.kiichain/config/app.toml

# config.toml
sed -i.bak -e "s%:26658%:${APP_PORT}658%g;
s%:26657%:${APP_PORT}657%g;
s%:6060%:${APP_PORT}060%g;
s%:26656%:${APP_PORT}656%g;
s%^external_address = \"\"%external_address = \"$(wget -qO- eth0.me):${APP_PORT}656\"%;
s%:26660%:${APP_PORT}660%g" $HOME/.kiichain/config/config.toml

docs.title: Create Service File
docs.text:
sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/kiichaind.service > /dev/null <<EOF
[Unit]
Description=kiichaind Node
After=network-online.target
[Service]
User=$USER
WorkingDirectory=$HOME/.kiichain
ExecStart=$(which kiichaind) start --home $HOME/.kiichain
Restart=on-failure
RestartSec=5
LimitNOFILE=65535
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

docs.title: Start Service
docs.text:
sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl enable kiichaind
sudo systemctl restart kiichaind && sudo journalctl -u kiichaind -fo cat

docs.title: Node Synchronize Checker
docs.text:
# Paste this to your terminal
bash <(curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kyronode/all-about-cosmos/refs/heads/main/Testnet/Kiichain/kiichain-sync.sh)

docs.title: Create or Restore Wallet
docs.text:
Create new wallet and save ur mnemonics securely

kiichaind keys add $WALLET

If u want to restore use this command

kiichaind keys add $WALLET --recover

Set keys variable enviroment

WALLET_ADDRESS=$(kiichaind keys show $WALLET -a)
VALOPER_ADDRESS=$(kiichaind keys show $WALLET --bech val -a)
echo "export WALLET_ADDRESS="$WALLET_ADDRESS >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export VALOPER_ADDRESS="$VALOPER_ADDRESS >> $HOME/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile

docs.title: Create Validator
docs.text:
If ur node has been fully synchronized, then u can create ur validator: Please Change <YOUR_MONIKER><YOUR_IDENTITY><YOUR_WEBSITE><YOUR_DETAILS> with ur own.

cd $HOME
echo "{
  \"pubkey\": {\"@type\": \"/cosmos.crypto.ed25519.PubKey\", \"key\": \"$(kiichaind tendermint show-validator | grep -Po '\"key\":\s*\"\K[^\"]*')\"},
  \"amount\": \"1000000000000000000akii\",
  \"moniker\": \"<YOUR_MONIKER>\",
  \"identity\": \"<YOUR_IDENTITY>\",
  \"website\": \"<YOUR_WEBSITE>\",
  \"security\": \"\",
  \"details\": \"<YOUR_DETAILS>\",
  \"commission-rate\": \"0.05\",
  \"commission-max-rate\": \"0.25\",
  \"commission-max-change-rate\": \"0.01\",
  \"min-self-delegation\": \"1\"
}" > validator.json

# Create a validator using the JSON configuration
kiichaind tx staking create-validator validator.json \
    --from wallet \
    --chain-id oro_1336-1 \
    --gas-prices 1250000000akii \
    --gas-adjustment 1.3 \
    --gas auto \
    -y

docs.title: Delete Node
docs.text:
Please backup ur wallet and important file like "priv_validator_key.json" before deleting. 

sudo systemctl stop kiichaind
sudo systemctl disable kiichaind
sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo rm -rf /etc/systemd/system/kiichaind.service
sudo rm $(which kiichaind)
sudo rm -rf $HOME/.kiichain

docs.title: 💾 Snapshot
docs.text:
To quickly sync your node from the latest snapshot: 

COMING SOON

docs.title: Manual Upgrade
docs.text:
cd $HOME
sudo systemctl stop kiichaind
rm -rf kiichain
git clone https://github.com/KiiChain/kiichain.git
cd kiichain
git fetch --tags
git checkout v4.0.0
make build
mv $HOME/go/bin/kiichaind $HOME/go/bin/kiichaind_backup
cp build/kiichaind $HOME/go/bin/kiichaind
chmod +x $HOME/go/bin/kiichaind
kiichaind version
sudo systemctl start kiichaind

docs.text: Component Recommended CPU 4 Cores RAM 8 GB Storage 1 TB NVMe SSD OS Ubuntu 22.04

docs.title: Install Go (if you don't have one)
docs.text:
cd $HOME
VER="1.23.4"
wget "https://golang.org/dl/go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/go
sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
rm "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"

[ ! -f ~/.bash_profile ] && touch ~/.bash_profile
echo "export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin:~/go/bin" >> ~/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile
[ ! -d ~/go/bin ] && mkdir -p ~/go/bin

docs.title: Set Environment Variables
docs.text:
# WARNING: Please replace <YOUR_WALLET>, <YOUR_MONIKER>, and <CUSTOM_PORT>
# with your own information before running the commands.
echo "export WALLET=<YOUR_WALLET>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export MONIKER=<YOUR_MONIKER>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export APP_PORT=<CUSTOM_PORT>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile

docs.title: Download Binary
docs.text:
cd $HOME
wget https://github.com/LumeraProtocol/lumera/releases/download/v1.7.0/lumera_v1.7.0_linux_amd64.tar.gz
tar -xvf lumera_v1.7.0_linux_amd64.tar.gz
rm lumera_v1.7.0_linux_amd64.tar.gz
rm install.sh
chmod +x lumerad
mv lumerad $HOME/go/bin/
mv libwasmvm.x86_64.so /usr/lib/

docs.title: Init & Config
docs.text:
lumerad init $MONIKER --chain-id lumera-testnet-2
lumerad config set client chain-id lumera-testnet-2
lumerad config set client node tcp://localhost:${APP_PORT}657

docs.title: Custom Ports
docs.text:
# app.toml
sed -i.bak -e "s%:1317%:${APP_PORT}317%g;
s%:8080%:${APP_PORT}080%g;
s%:9090%:${APP_PORT}090%g;

# config.toml

s%:26657%:${APP_PORT}657%g;
s%:6060%:${APP_PORT}060%g;
s%:26656%:${APP_PORT}656%g;
s%^external_address = \"\"%external_address = \"$(wget -qO- eth0.me):${APP_PORT}656\"%;
s%:26660%:${APP_PORT}660%g" $HOME/.lumera/config/config.toml

docs.title: Create Service File
docs.text:
sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/lumerad.service > /dev/null <<EOF
[Unit]
Description=lumerad Node
After=network-online.target
[Service]
User=$USER
WorkingDirectory=$HOME/.lumera
ExecStart=$(which lumerad) start --home $HOME/.lumera
Restart=on-failure
RestartSec=5
LimitNOFILE=65535
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

docs.title: Withdraw rewards and commission from your validator
Delegate to Yourself
docs.text: safrochaind tx staking delegate $(safrochaind keys show $WALLET --bech val -a) 1000000usaf --from $WALLET  --chain-id safro-testnet-1   --gas auto --gas-adjustment 1.2 --fees 50000usaf -y

docs.title: Unbond
docs.text: safrochaind tx staking unbond $(safrochaind keys show $WALLET --bech val -a) 1000000usaf --from $WALLET --chain-id safro-testnet-1 --gas auto --gas-adjustment 1.2 --fees 50000usaf -y

docs.title: Validator Details
docs.text: safrochaind q staking validator $(safrochaind keys show $WALLET --bech val -a)

docs.title: Active Validators List
docs.text: safrochaind q staking validators -oj --limit=2000 | jq '.validators[] | select(.status=="BOND_STATUS_BONDED")' | jq -r '(.tokens|tonumber/pow(10;6)|floor|tostring) + " " + .description.moniker' | sort -gr | nl

docs.title: Check Validator key
docs.text: [[ $(safrochaind q staking validator $VALOPER_ADDRESS -oj | jq -r .consensus_pubkey.key) = $(safrochaind status | jq -r .ValidatorInfo.PubKey.value) ]] && echo -e "Your key status is ok" || echo -e "Your key status is error"

docs.title: Edit Validator
docs.text:
safrochaind tx staking edit-validator \
--commission-rate 0.05 \
--new-moniker "$MONIKER" \
--identity "" \
--details "Kyronode for all" \
--from $$WALLET \
--chain-id safro-testnet-1 \
--gas auto \
--gas-adjustment 1.2 \
--fees 50000usaf \
-y

docs.title: Vote
docs.text: safrochaind tx gov vote 1 yes --from $$WALLET --chain-id safro-testnet-1 --gas auto --gas-adjustment 1.2 --fees 50000usaf   -y

docs.title: 🚀 Safrochain Installation Guide
docs.text: This guide helps you set up and run a Safrochain Node. 🔗 Website | Discord | Twitter

docs.title: 📋 Recommended Specifications
docs.text: Component Recommended CPU 4 Cores RAM 8 GB Storage 1 TB NVMe SSD OS Ubuntu 22.04

docs.title: Install Go (if you don't have one)
docs.text:
cd $HOME
VER="1.23.8"
wget "https://golang.org/dl/go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/go
sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
rm "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"

[ ! -f ~/.bash_profile ] && touch ~/.bash_profile
echo "export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin:~/go/bin" >> ~/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile
[ ! -d ~/go/bin ] && mkdir -p ~/go/bin

docs.title: Set Environment Variables
docs.text:
# WARNING: Please replace <YOUR_WALLET>, <YOUR_MONIKER>, and <CUSTOM_PORT>
# with your own information before running the commands.
echo "export WALLET=<YOUR_WALLET>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export MONIKER=<YOUR_MONIKER>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export APP_PORT=<CUSTOM_PORT>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile

docs.title: Download Binary
docs.text:
cd $HOME
rm -rf safrochain-node
git clone https://github.com/Safrochain-Org/safrochain-node.git
cd safrochain-node
git checkout v0.1.0
make install

docs.title: Init & Config
docs.text:
safrochaind init $MONIKER --chain-id safro-testnet-1
safrochaind config set client chain-id safro-testnet-1
safrochaind config set client node tcp://localhost:${APP_PORT}657

docs.title: Custom Ports
docs.text:
# app.toml
sed -i.bak -e "s%:1317%:${APP_PORT}317%g;
s%:8080%:${APP_PORT}080%g;
s%:9090%:${APP_PORT}090%g;
s%:9091%:${APP_PORT}091%g;
s%:8545%:${APP_PORT}545%g;
s%:8546%:${APP_PORT}546%g;
s%:6065%:${APP_PORT}065%g" $HOME/.safrochain/config/app.toml

# config.toml
sed -i.bak -e "s%:26658%:${APP_PORT}658%g;
s%:26657%:${APP_PORT}657%g;
s%:6060%:${APP_PORT}060%g;
s%:26656%:${APP_PORT}656%g;
s%^external_address = \"\"%external_address = \"$(wget -qO- eth0.me):${APP_PORT}656\"%;
s%:26660%:${APP_PORT}660%g" $HOME/.safrochain/config/config.toml

docs.title: Create Service File
docs.text:
sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/safrochaind.service > /dev/null <<EOF
[Unit]
Description=safrochaind Node
After=network-online.target
[Service]
User=$USER
WorkingDirectory=$HOME/.safrochain
ExecStart=$(which safrochaind) start --home $HOME/.safrochain
Restart=on-failure
RestartSec=5
LimitNOFILE=65535
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

docs.title: Start Service
docs.text:
sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl enable safrochaind
sudo systemctl restart safrochaind && sudo journalctl -u safrochaind -fo cat

docs.title: Node Synchronize Checker
docs.text:
# Paste this to your terminal
bash <(curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kyronode/all-about-cosmos/refs/heads/main/Testnet/Safrochain/safro-sync.sh)

docs.title: Create or Restore Wallet
docs.text:
Create new wallet and save ur mnemonics securely

safrochaind keys add $WALLET

If u want to restore use this command

safrochaind keys add $WALLET --recover

Set keys variable enviroment

WALLET_ADDRESS=$(safrochaind keys show $WALLET -a)
VALOPER_ADDRESS=$(safrochaind keys show $WALLET --bech val -a)
echo "export WALLET_ADDRESS="$WALLET_ADDRESS >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export VALOPER_ADDRESS="$VALOPER_ADDRESS >> $HOME/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile

docs.title: Create Validator
docs.text:
If ur node has been fully synchronized, then u can create ur validator: Please Change <YOUR_MONIKER><YOUR_IDENTITY><YOUR_WEBSITE><YOUR_DETAILS> with ur own.

cd $HOME
echo "{
  \"pubkey\": {\"@type\": \"/cosmos.crypto.ed25519.PubKey\", \"key\": \"$(safrochaind tendermint show-validator | grep -Po '\"key\":\s*\"\K[^\"]*')\"},
  \"amount\": \"1000000usaf\",
  \"moniker\": \"<YOUR_MONIKER>\",
  \"identity\": \"<YOUR_IDENTITY>\",
  \"website\": \"<YOUR_WEBSITE>\",
  \"security\": \"\",
  \"details\": \"<YOUR_DETAILS>\",
  \"commission-rate\": \"0.05\",
  \"commission-max-rate\": \"0.25\",
  \"commission-max-change-rate\": \"0.01\",
  \"min-self-delegation\": \"1\"
}" > validator.json

# Create a validator using the JSON configuration
safrochaind tx staking create-validator validator.json \
    --from $WALLET \
    --chain-id safro-testnet-1 \
    --fees 5000usaf \
    --gas-adjustment 1.3 \
    --gas auto \
    -y

docs.title: Delete Node
docs.text:
Please backup ur wallet and important file like "priv_validator_key.json" before deleting. 

sudo systemctl stop safrochaind
sudo systemctl disable safrochaind
sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo rm -rf /etc/systemd/system/safrochaind.service
sudo rm $(which safrochaind)
sudo rm -rf $HOME/.safrochain

docs.title: 💾 Snapshot
docs.text:
To quickly sync your node from the latest snapshot: 

COMING SOON

docs.title: Manual Upgrade
docs.text:
cd $HOME
sudo systemctl stop safrochaind
rm -rf safrochain-node
git clone https://github.com/Safrochain-Org/safrochain-node.git
cd safrochain-node
git checkout v0.1.0
make install
sudo systemctl start safrochaind

docs.title: Withdraw rewards and commission from your validator
Delegate to Yourself
docs.text: zenrockd tx staking delegate $(zenrockd keys show $WALLET --bech val -a) 1000000urock --from $WALLET --chain-id gardia-9 --gas auto --gas-adjustment 1.5 --fees 30urock -y

docs.title: Unbond
docs.text: zenrockd tx staking unbond $(zenrockd keys show $WALLET --bech val -a) 1000000urock --from $WALLET --chain-id gardia-9 --gas auto --gas-adjustment 1.5 --fees 30urock -y

docs.title: Validator Details
docs.text: zenrockd q staking validator $(zenrockd keys show $WALLET --bech val -a)

docs.title: Active Validators List
docs.text: zenrockd q staking validators -oj --limit=2000 | jq '.validators[] | select(.status=="BOND_STATUS_BONDED")' | jq -r '(.tokens|tonumber/pow(10;6)|floor|tostring) + " " + .description.moniker' | sort -gr | nl

docs.title: Check Validator key
docs.text: [[ $(zenrockd q staking validator $VALOPER_ADDRESS -oj | jq -r .consensus_pubkey.key) = $(zenrockd status | jq -r .ValidatorInfo.PubKey.value) ]] && echo -e "Your key status is ok" || echo -e "Your key status is error"

docs.title: Edit Validator
docs.text:
zenrockd tx staking edit-validator \
--commission-rate 0.05 \
--new-moniker "$MONIKER" \
--identity "" \
--details "Kyronode for all" \
--from $WALLET \
--chain-id gardia-9 \
--gas auto \
--gas-adjustment 1.5 \
--fees 30urock \
-y

docs.title: Vote
docs.text: zenrockd tx gov vote 1 yes --from $WALLET --chain-id gardia-9 --gas auto --gas-adjustment 1.5 --fees 30urock -y

docs.title: 🚀 Zenrock Installation Guide
docs.text: This guide helps you set up and run a Zenrock Node. 🔗 Website | Discord | Twitter

docs.title: 📋 Recommended Specifications
docs.text: Component Recommended CPU 4 Cores RAM 8 GB Storage 200 GB NVMe SSD OS Ubuntu 22.04

docs.title: Install Go (if you don't have one)
docs.text:
cd $HOME
VER="1.23.4"
wget "https://golang.org/dl/go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
sudo rm -rf /usr/local/go
sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"
rm "go$VER.linux-amd64.tar.gz"

[ ! -f ~/.bash_profile ] && touch ~/.bash_profile
echo "export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin:~/go/bin" >> ~/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile
[ ! -d ~/go/bin ] && mkdir -p ~/go/bin

docs.title: Set Environment Variables
docs.text:
# WARNING: Please replace <YOUR_WALLET>, <YOUR_MONIKER>, and <CUSTOM_PORT>
# with your own information before running the commands.
echo "export WALLET=<YOUR_WALLET>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export MONIKER=<YOUR_MONIKER>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
echo "export APP_PORT=<CUSTOM_PORT>" >> $HOME/.bash_profile
source $HOME/.bash_profile

docs.title: Download Binary
docs.text:
cd $HOME
wget -O zenrockd.zip https://github.com/Zenrock-Foundation/zrchain/releases/download/v6.25.0/zenrockd.zip
unzip zenrockd.zip
rm zenrockd.zip
chmod +x $HOME/zenrockd
sudo mv $HOME/zenrockd $HOME/go/bin/

docs.title: Init & Config
docs.text:
zenrockd init $MONIKER --chain-id empe-testnet-2
zenrockd config set client chain-id empe-testnet-2
zenrockd config set client node tcp://localhost:${APP_PORT}657

docs.title: Custom Ports
docs.text:

sed -i.bak -e "s%:1317%:${APP_PORT}317%g;
s%:8080%:${APP_PORT}080%g;
s%:9090%:${APP_PORT}090%g;
s%:9091%:${APP_PORT}091%g;
s%:8545%:${APP_PORT}545%g;
s%:8546%:${APP_PORT}546%g;
s%:6065%:${APP_PORT}065%g" $HOME/.zrchain/config/app.toml

# config.toml

s%:26657%:${APP_PORT}657%g;
s%:6060%:${APP_PORT}060%g;
s%:26656%:${APP_PORT}656%g;
s%^external_address = \"\"%external_address = \"$(wget -qO- eth0.me):${APP_PORT}656\"%;
s%:26660%:${APP_PORT}660%g" $HOME/.zrchain/config/config.toml

[Unit]
Description=zenrockd Node
After=network-online.target
[Service]
User=$USER
WorkingDirectory=$HOME/.zrchain
ExecStart=$(which zenrockd) start --home $HOME/.zrchain
Restart=on-failure
RestartSec=5
LimitNOFILE=65535
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF

docs.title: Manual Upgrade
docs.text:
cd $HOME
wget -O zenrockd.zip https://github.com/Zenrock-Foundation/zrchain/releases/download/v6.25.0/zenrockd.zip
unzip zenrockd.zip

chmod +x $HOME/zenrockd
